Articles.Content:
Whether we love or hate the new look & feel of the forums or anything in between, I'm sure we can all agree that it is a valuable resource that was indeed missed.  Thanks Squad for all your hard work in providing this resource for us.

 

Danny

I dont know... I can't help but think this new forum could've waited until after 1.1. So how much dev time was lost in the migration? How much dev time will be lost trouble shooting the mess that is this forum? 

Squad really needs to assess there management. All of this... It wasn't necessary. I want 1.1. I want screenshots. I want detailed news from the devs. Hell is 1.1 even bring worked on anymore? Or is it a mad house over there trying to fix things? 

All of this was absolutely uncalled for.

28 minutes ago, Motokid600 said:

 

I dont know... I can't help but think this new forum could've waited until after 1.1. So how much dev time was lost in the migration? How much dev time will be lost trouble shooting the mess that is this forum? 

Squad really needs to assess there management. All of this... It wasn't necessary. I want 1.1. I want screenshots. I want detailed news from the devs. Hell is 1.1 even bring worked on anymore? Or is it a mad house over there trying to fix things? 

All of this was absolutely uncalled for.

Software devs =/= web devs. 0% dev time was lost in this

3 hours ago, TheCanadianVendingMachine said:

Software devs =/= web devs. 0% dev time was lost in this

You sure about that? I hope so. Either way no offense, but I'd rather here that from them. I want to know exactly why this migration was necessary. Why they chose to fix something that wasn't broken in the midst of the 1.1 update.

2 minutes ago, Motokid600 said:

You sure about that? I hope so. Either way no offense, but I'd rather here that from them. I want to know exactly why this migration was necessary. Why they chose to fix something that wasn't broken in the midst of the 1.1 update.

I am 100% certain that the game dev team had no part in this. That's just not how it works.

AFAIK, the switch was because VBulletin was getting worse, and less support
Let's hope that was the case. Either way tomorrows devnotes should be interesting.

I absolutely hate the new forums. Because not the ui or anything else but I have gotten the 502 bad gateway more than I should have over the course of 3 days.

Btw kaspervid said that he is doing the forum upgrade and the revs are doing 1.1

Just now, 322997am said:

I absolutely hate the new forums. Because not the ui or anything else but I have gotten the 502 bad gateway more than I should have over the course of 3 days.

Those should be resolved now, do let me know if they still happen
I haven't gotten any today yet. But i don't know if it's fixed.
